You're gonna have to face you fear, sooner or later.

你总得面对自己恐惧的

Growing up is such a barbarous business, full of 
inconvenience and pimples.

成长是一件如此野蛮的事情，充满了麻烦和不快。

If you saw the darkness in front of you, don't be afraid, 
that's because sunshine is at your back.

如果看到面前的阴影,别怕 ，那是因为你背后有光。

Never underestimate any living spirits' will to survive
especially when they're surrounded by family.

永远不要低估任何生物的求生意志，尤其当它们有家人相伴的时候。

Falling in love with yourself first doesn’t make you vain
or selfish, it makes you indestructible.

先爱自己不会让你变得无用或自私，它会让你无坚不摧。

The world doesn't just disappear when you close your eyes.

即使闭上眼睛，世界并没有消失。

If we don't have the guts to try anything,what's the 
meaning of life.

如果我们任何事情都没有勇气去尝试,人生还有什么意义
